attributes.action: independent review of the medicine health regulator umited kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
To have the government look into having an Independent Body review of The Medicine Health Regulator Authority 151 Buckingham Palace Road London in The United Kingdom for failing the public in allowing mesh medical devices for transvaginal sling/tape bladder surgery ontoThe Worlwide market without robust clinical trials

These mesh medical devices are causing serious complications pain and suffering to women and this needs to be addressed.
